title: NEW semi-serious competitive ranked team
body:
Interested in responsible, **higher elo** players willing to commit to a fresh team.
We aim to construct a solid roster with skilled players dedicated to improving in their specific role and as a team. Currently interested in players for all roles and once a roster is constructed practicing 3-4 sessions a week during the pre-season.
**Requirements needed**

* Higher solo/duo queue rank, preferred Diamond and above

* Available and committed to training 3-4 sessions a week
* Experience in the role specified

* Able to communicate well in ENGLISH

* Oceanic region 

Once received enough applications, a _trials date_ will be announced.
Feel free too add me in client 'Shke' for any inquires 
Thank you

replies.body: Be on Friday 5pm for custom games, add me if haven't already- Shke
